languages.text: "И теперь я как никогда верю, что была права. Мой путь сюда был оплачен кровью невинно павших, но их жертва будет не напрасна! Я войду под своды священного корабля, и прикоснусь к святыне, и с новыми силами обращу гнев против зла".

traits.locale_text: "И теперь я как никогда верю, что была права. Мой путь сюда был оплачен кровью невинно павших, но их жертва будет ненапрасна! Я войду под своды священного корабля, и прикоснусь к святыне, и с новыми силами обращу гнев против зла".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."
languages.original_text: "И теперь я как никогда верю, что была права. Мой путь сюда был оплачен кровью невинно павших, но их жертва будет не напрасна! Я войду под своды священного корабля, и прикоснусь к святыне, и с новыми силами обращу гнев против зла".

traits.locale_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そして今、我はかつてないほど、自分が正しかったのだと信じています。我の旅は堕ちたる無垢な者達の血で贖われているが、彼らの犠牲を無駄にはしない！我は神聖な船のホールに乗り込む。我の手で聖遺物を確保し、我の怒りを不道徳な者へ向ける新しい強さを見つけるのだ」
languages.original_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: 「そして今、我はかつてないほど、自分が正しかったのだと信じています。我の旅は堕ちたる無垢な者達の血で贖われているが、彼らの犠牲を無駄にはしない！我は神聖な船のホールに乗り込む。我の手で聖遺物を確保し、我の怒りを不道徳な者へ向ける新しい強さを見つけるのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “而现在，我必以前更加坚信我的选择是对的。在这场旅程中，许多无辜之人洒下了鲜血，但他们的牺牲绝不会白费！我要进入圣船的大厅，将我的手放在那件圣物上。我要用新的力量与怒火，消灭一切邪恶之人。“
languages.original_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: “而现在，我必以前更加坚信我的选择是对的。在这场旅程中，许多无辜之人洒下了鲜血，但他们的牺牲绝不会白费！我要进入圣船的大厅，将我的手放在那件圣物上。我要用新的力量与怒火，消灭一切邪恶之人。“
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Et, maintenant plus que jamais, je suis convaincue de ne pas m'être trompée. Mon voyage en ces lieux a certes coûté la vie à des innocents, mais leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain ! Je vais pénétrer dans les entrailles du vaisseau sacré, et la relique me conférera une force renouvelée pour tourner ma colère contre les agents du mal. »
languages.original_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: « Et, maintenant plus que jamais, je suis convaincue de ne pas m'être trompée. Mon voyage en ces lieux a certes coûté la vie à des innocents, mais leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain ! Je vais pénétrer dans les entrailles du vaisseau sacré, et la relique me conférera une force renouvelée pour tourner ma colère contre les agents du mal. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Ahora más que nunca creo que tenía razón. Mi viaje hasta aquí se ha cobrado la sangre de numerosos inocentes, ¡y no permitiré que sea en vano! Entraré en la nave sagrada. Colocaré mis manos sobre la reliquia y descubriré nuevas fuerzas con las que dirigir mi ira contra los malvados».
languages.original_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora más que nunca creo que tenía razón. Mi viaje hasta aquí se ha cobrado la sangre de numerosos inocentes, ¡y no permitiré que sea en vano! Entraré en la nave sagrada. Colocaré mis manos sobre la reliquia y descubriré nuevas fuerzas con las que dirigir mi ira contra los malvados».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Und ich glaube jetzt mehr denn je, dass ich recht hatte. Meine Reise hierher wurde mit dem Blut gefallener Unschuldiger bezahlt, aber ihr Opfer wird nicht umsonst gewesen sein! Ich werde die Hallen des heiligen Schiffs betreten. Ich werde meine Hand auf das Relikt legen und neue Kraft finden, um meinen Zorn gegen die Bösen zu richten."
languages.original_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich glaube jetzt mehr denn je, dass ich recht hatte. Meine Reise hierher wurde mit dem Blut gefallener Unschuldiger bezahlt, aber ihr Opfer wird nicht umsonst gewesen sein! Ich werde die Hallen des heiligen Schiffs betreten. Ich werde meine Hand auf das Relikt legen und neue Kraft finden, um meinen Zorn gegen die Bösen zu richten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Şu anda haklılığıma, her zamankinden daha çok inanıyorum. Buraya kadarki yolculuğumun bedeli, yitip giden masumların kanıyla ödendi. Ancak fedakârlıkları nafile olmayacak! Kutsal geminin koridorlarına ayak basacağım. Yadigârı bulacak ve hiddetimi kötülüğe karşı kullanabileceğim, yepyeni bir güç elde edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "And now, more than ever, I believe that I was right. My journey here was paid for in the blood of fallen innocents, but their sacrifice will not be for naught! I will enter the halls of the hallowed ship. I will lay my hand upon the relic and find new strength to turn my wrath against the wicked."

traits.locale_text: "Şu anda haklılığıma, her zamankinden daha çok inanıyorum. Buraya kadarki yolculuğumun bedeli, düşen masumların kanıyla ödendi. Ancak fedakârlıkları nafile olmayacak! Kutsal geminin koridorlarına ayak basacağım. Yadigârı bulacağım ve hiddetimi habisliklere karşı kullanmak için yepyeni bir güç elde edeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
